name: Set Orion Station Locations
action: <*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Orion Station Location/Cluster/Network Group)*><*xDisallowallValuesExcept(Orion Station Location/Cluster/Network Group:<* LIST ( SELECT AttValue FROM ClusterAttValues WHERE CAST (AttValueCode AS float) <= '<*CTX( Container(List of Locations/Clusters/Network Groups).Rows.GetCount )*>' ) *>)*>
description: Rule to set dropdown values for Orion Station Location/Cluster/Network Group
